features: FEEL FRESH ALL DAY - Go out with the confidence you need to take on the day. Infused with tea tree oil and Teflose, our vaginal wash helps keep your intimate area clean and without unpleasant odors.

PROTECT WHAT MATTERS - With willow bark extract and allantoin, our intimate wash may help soothe your intimate spot and protect it from itching. It also has lactic acid that keeps your pH level at 4.5.

REVITALIZE YOUR SKIN- Packed with Activoil Spotless, Alpine Rose Active, chamomile extract, and vitamins E, B5, and C, this feminine care wash may help brighten, moisturize, and soften the intimate area.
POWER OF NATURE - Care for your skin with nature’s healing powers. This vegan pH balance feminine wash is made with natural ingredients, so you’re sure that it’s safe for you and the environment.
GENTLE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Our feminine wash for women has zero alcohol, SLS, silicone, soap, paraben, colorant, triclosan, and MIT/CMIT, so you’re sure that it won’t cause irritation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Need Help Caring For Your Intimate Area? Keeping your delicate area clean and fresh is an important part of female hygiene. However, washing with water may not be sufficient to remove odors and unclean residue. You also need the help of a safe and effective feminine wash to ensure that you’re protected down there. A good intimate wash should help balance your pH level, eliminate unpleasant smells, moisturize dry skin, and prevent itchiness. Lucky for you, we have one that’ll tick all the right boxes and help boost your confidence! Feel confidently beautiful with the help of a gentle feminine cleanser. Formulated with tea tree oil, our feminine wash helps get rid of unpleasant odors, so your intimate area stays fresh for longer. It also has Teflose that safeguards your lady part from the formation of harmful elements, keeping it clean all day. Now, you can take on any task and go anywhere you want without any discomfort!
SGS Laboratory Testing results as RACHAA Extra Sensitive Feminine Cleanser shows the mercury confirmation that "Not detected" under laboratories accredited to the ISO/IEC 17025 standard.

RACHAA Extra Gentle Intimate Skin Brightening Cream RACHAA Extra Sensitive Feminine Cleanser Key Ingredient Cywhite, Vitamin C & Vitamin B3, Shea Butter & Cocoa Butter, SK-InfluxⓇ V MB, Jojoba Oil & Organic Phytosqualan Tea Tree Oil & Teflose, Lactic Acid, Willow Bark Extract & Allantoin, Activoil Spotless, Organic Alpine Rose Active, Organic Chamomile Extract & Vitamin E, B5, C Key Benefit Brightening, Moisturizing, Smoothing, Anti-stretch marks, Tightening, Suitable to use for sensitive area, underarms, bikini lines and bumps. pH 4.5 Balance, Remove unpleasant odor, Reduce itching & irritation, Brightening, Smoothing, Moisturizing, Refreshing Not Tested on Animals ✓ ✓ No SLS ✓ ✓ Paraben Free ✓ ✓ Vegan ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gentle and Refreshing Essential
reviews.reviewText: I recently incorporated a Feminine Wash into my personal care routine, and I can't express enough how thrilled I am with the results. This product has truly become a game-changer for me, and I wholeheartedly give it a well-deserved five-star rating.First and foremost, the Feminine Wash I've been using is gentle and delicately formulated to maintain the natural pH balance of the intimate area. This is of utmost importance when it comes to feminine hygiene, as it helps prevent irritation, discomfort, and infections. The carefully selected ingredients work in harmony with my body, providing a soothing and refreshing cleansing experience.One of the standout features of the Feminine Wash is its mild and subtle fragrance. It's neither overpowering nor artificial, but rather leaves a clean and pleasant scent that boosts my confidence throughout the day. I appreciate that the fragrance is specifically designed to be gentle on sensitive skin, ensuring no unnecessary irritation.The product itself comes in a convenient and hygienic packaging, allowing for easy dispensing and ensuring that the wash remains fresh and free from contaminants. The consistency is smooth and lathers up nicely, providing a luxurious and thorough cleansing experience without any residue. It rinses off effortlessly, leaving me feeling clean, fresh, and invigorated.What truly sets this Feminine Wash apart is its dedication to using high-quality and natural ingredients. The absence of harsh chemicals and artificial additives provides peace of mind, knowing that I am caring for my intimate area with utmost gentleness. It's a relief to find a product that prioritizes the well-being of its users while delivering exceptional results.Additionally, this Feminine Wash has proven to be versatile and suitable for various situations. Whether I'm looking for a refreshing cleanse during my daily shower routine or need extra care during my menstrual cycle, this product has consistently delivered the utmost comfort and cleanliness. It has become an essential part of my feminine hygiene regimen, providing me with the confidence and peace of mind I deserve.In conclusion, I highly recommend incorporating this Feminine Wash into your personal care routine, and I can't praise it enough. Its gentle and refreshing qualities, along with its dedication to natural ingredients, make it an absolute essential. Take care of your intimate area with the respect and care it deserves by choosing a top-notch Feminine Wash. Trust me, you won't be disappointed. It's a five-star must-have for every woman.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: Products like these are hard for me to review when they have ingredients contained in them that I don't want to use, specifically fragrance. Fragrance (or parfum), is a catchall for a myriad of different ingredients, some you might be allergic to. I don't want to risk that, especially in an already sensitive area. There are also some PEGS and and a sulfate type ingredient that makes me a little hesitant. On the plus side, there are some healthy oils in here and a number of natural extracts. But then again, a lot of those might be sensitizing as well. The bottle is pretty and formula a pink gel that definitely smells like a floral perfume a la Bath & Body works....so I'm thinking "hand wash" ?!?

reviews.reviewText: It smells so good! It’s not a strong scent. Its like a natural scent with oils. It helps me stay fresh all day long

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product and it works. Fixes strong order and any discharge that makes you feel insecure.
reviews.reviewText: To make this short, this product fixed me and will now be my forever daily routine. No more strong oders and don't have to buy more undies. I know sorry tmi but its the truth! And I'm actually a really clean person, I eat healthy and only drink water and coffee. So I never understood why I still had strong orders and my undies always looked bad ( although with a quick Google search it means I have a healthy vag but hated it since it did make me insecure) but now I can officially say, after almost done using this bottle that I'm fixed!
